name: uibuilder/jQuery Example
info:
[Front-End](/jq)

## Configuration

Install jQuery via the nodes configuration panel.

Then update the files:

* `index.html`
* `index.js`
* `index.css`

According to the jQuery example(s) in the 
[WIKI](https://github.com/TotallyInformation/node-red-contrib-uibuilder/wiki/Example:-JQuery)
which are also included in the 3 other comment nodes in this example.

name: index.html
info:
Welcome to UIbuilder for Node-RED

This is an example of using uibuilder with jQuery. If you open the developer console, you will see some debug output. You can also see some dynamic data updating below, thanks to JQuery. Additional information may be available in the WIKI

Please see the README for the node-red-contrib-uibuilder node for details on how to use uibuilder.

Dynamic Data (via JQuery)

UIBuilder Front-End Version:

Websocket State:

Messages Received:

Control Messages Received:

Messages Sent:

Last Message Received:

Last Control Message Received:

Last Message Sent:

index.css
info:
